title: About G-Source
content:
G-Source is a platform for the Gorilla Tag fan game community. Discover Developer Hubs and search globally for scripts from G-Source Developers. Browse scripts, vote them up or down, and explore hubs you can rate.

  • Search scripts across the community
  • Upvote or downvote to surface the best work
  • Find and rate Developer Hubs

Become a GS Contributor

Add the G-Source Bot to your server (no risky permissionsâ€”read-only data) and start the setup process.

Use /setup in the bot to begin.
